synopsis.text:
Souichirou and Touma Tachibana, a pair of gifted stepbrothers, step into the world of high school baseball with a shared dream and a legacy to uphold. As second-year students at Meisei High School, they strive to restore the glory of their school's baseball team, which once shone brightly under the leadership of Tatsuya Uesugi and Kazuya, the fathers of the Tachibana brothers.

The Meisei High School baseball team, once a powerhouse that clinched the National High School Baseball Championship three decades ago, has since lost its lustre. However, with the arrival of the Tachibana brothers, the team is presented with a new opportunity to rise to the top once more.

Souichirou, a skilled catcher and batter, and Touma, an exceptional pitcher with a mysterious past that prevents him from pitching, form a formidable duo on the field. As they navigate the challenges of high school baseball, they follow in their fathers' footsteps, aiming to lead their team to victory at the national championship.

With their sights set on the prestigious Koshien, the brothers embark on a journey filled with passion, determination, and the unbreakable bond of family. Will they be able to fulfill their dream and restore Meisei High School's baseball legacy? Join them in this heartwarming and thrilling baseball drama that appeals to all ages and genders.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
